ReferenceDocuments.name: Were any surgical, therapeuti
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were any surgical, therapeutic or diagnostic procedures performed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH PROMPT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Any Procedures

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology
ReferenceDocuments.description: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if the subject had any surgical, therapeutic or diagnostic procedures. If "Yes", include the appropriate details where indicated on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: N/A
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does not map to an SDTMIG variable. The SDTM Annotated CRF is annotated to indicate that this field is NOT SUBMITTED.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The intent/purpose of collecting this field is to help with data cleaning and monitoring. It provides verification that all other fields on the CRF were deliberately left blank.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive any anti-cancer therapy during this follow-up period?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a chest CT as part of the COVID-19 work up?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Were eligibility confirmation labs performed after enrollment

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive any anti-cancer therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient start any anti-cancer therapy during this follow-up period?

ReferenceDocuments.description: If Yes, Specify

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received a stem cell transplant not previously reported?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive any anti-cancer therapy during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Participant had prior stem vaporization (Rezum), transurethral resection of the prostate (TURP), prostatectomy (simple or radical), or any ablative therapy to the prostate (cryotherapy, HIFU, TULSA, focal laser ablation, photodynamic therapy).

ReferenceDocuments.description: Will the patient require primary tumor resection during Induction?

ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient had a GEIR AND complete response (CR) of the primary site at the end of Induction AND did not have PD during Induction, did the patient receive reduced radiation therapy to the primary site clinical target volume?
